Title: User Registration - valid data (desktop)
Regression:
1. Open registration page on desktop
2. Enter valid name,email,password
3. Click Register
Reviewed by QA Lead: User account created, confirmation email sent

Title: User Registration - valid data (mobile)
Regression:
1. Open registration on mobile
2. Enter valid data
3. Tap Register
Reviewed by QA Lead: Account created and confirmation SMS/email

Title: User Registration - duplicate email
Regression:
1. Try registering with an email already in use
2. Submit
Reviewed by QA Lead: Error: Email already registered

Title: Login - valid credentials (desktop)
Regression:
1. Open login page
2. Enter valid credentials
3. Click Login
Reviewed by QA Lead: User redirected to homepage/dashboard

Title: Login - valid credentials (mobile)
Regression:
1. Open login on mobile
2. Enter credentials
3. Tap Login
Reviewed by QA Lead: User logged in successfully

Title: Login - incorrect password
Regression:
1. Enter valid email and wrong password
2. Submit
Reviewed by QA Lead: Error message 'Invalid credentials'

Title: Forgot Password flow
Regression:
1. Click 'Forgot Password'
2. Enter registered email
3. Submit
Reviewed by QA Lead: Password reset email link sent

Title: Session timeout after inactivity
Regression:
1. Login and stay inactive for 15 minutes
2. Try to perform action
Reviewed by QA Lead: Session expired; user prompted to login again

Title: Catalog listing - loads with pagination (desktop)
Regression:
1. Open Catalog page on desktop
2. Scroll first page
3. Navigate to page 2
Reviewed by QA Lead: Books listed, pagination works

Title: Catalog listing - loads with infinite scroll (mobile)
Regression:
1. Open Catalog on mobile
2. Scroll down to load more items
Reviewed by QA Lead: More items load without full page refresh

Title: Book detail displays correct info
Regression:
1. Click a book from catalog
2. Open detail page
Reviewed by QA Lead: Book shows title, author, price, description, stock

Title: Filter by category and sort by price
Regression:
1. Apply category filter
2. Sort by price low to high
Reviewed by QA Lead: Filtered and sorted results match criteria

Title: Thumbnail images load correctly
Regression:
1. Open catalog
2. View thumbnails
Reviewed by QA Lead: Images load and are not broken

Title: Out of stock books marked correctly
Regression: 1. Open a book detail that is out of stock
Reviewed by QA Lead: Display shows 'Out of stock' and disables Add to Cart

Title: Search by title returns results (desktop)
Regression:
1. Enter known title in search bar
2. Click search
Reviewed by QA Lead: Relevant books matching title displayed

Title: Search by author returns results (mobile)
Regression:
1. On mobile, enter author name
2. Tap search
Reviewed by QA Lead: Books by that author are shown

Title: Search with autocomplete suggestions
Regression:
1. Start typing in search field
2. Observe suggestions dropdown
Reviewed by QA Lead: Relevant suggestions appear

Title: Search no results scenario
Regression: 1. Search for random string with no matches
Reviewed by QA Lead: Page shows 'No results found' and suggestions

Title: Search performance (response time)
Regression:
1. Search for popular title
2. Measure response time
Reviewed by QA Lead: Results returned within 2 seconds

Title: Add to cart from detail page (desktop)
Regression:
1. Open desktop book detail
2. Click Add to Cart
Reviewed by QA Lead: Item added and cart count increments

Title: Add to cart from listing page (mobile)
Regression:
1. On mobile, tap 'Add to Cart' on listing
2. Observe cart
Reviewed by QA Lead: Item added and cart icon updated

Title: Update quantity in cart
Regression:
1. Go to cart
2. Change quantity and update
Reviewed by QA Lead: Cart total recalculated correctly

Title: Remove item from cart
Regression:
1. Go to cart
2. Click remove on item
3. Confirm
Reviewed by QA Lead: Item removed and total updated

Title: Cart persists after logout/login
Regression:
1. Add item to cart
2. Logout and login again
3. Check cart
Reviewed by QA Lead: Cart retains the item after login

Title: Apply discount code (valid/invalid)
Regression:
1. Enter valid coupon code at cart
2. Apply
3. Also test invalid code
Reviewed by QA Lead: Valid code applies discount; invalid code shows error

Title: Checkout with valid card (desktop)
Regression:
1. Proceed to checkout
2. Enter valid billing/shipping
3. Enter card details
4. Submit
Reviewed by QA Lead: Order placed; confirmation displayed and email sent

Title: Checkout with valid card (mobile)
Regression:
1. On mobile, proceed to checkout
2. Enter details and pay
Reviewed by QA Lead: Order placed successfully and mobile confirmation shown

Title: Checkout with expired card
Regression:
1. Enter expired card details
2. Submit
Reviewed by QA Lead: Payment declined with proper error message

Title: Shipping address validation
Regression:
1. Enter invalid address details
2. Try to proceed
Reviewed by QA Lead: Validation errors shown; cannot proceed

Title: Order summary correctness
Regression: 1. Review order summary before payment
Reviewed by QA Lead: Order summary shows correct item, quantity, taxes, shipping

Title: Email confirmation content check
Regression: 1. After successful order, open confirmation email
Reviewed by QA Lead: Email contains order id, summary, delivery estimate

Title: Payment gateway timeout handling
Regression:
1. Simulate slow gateway
2. Attempt payment
Reviewed by QA Lead: User sees timeout message and can retry

Title: Edit profile info (desktop)
Regression:
1. Login
2. Go to profile
3. Edit name/email
4. Save
Reviewed by QA Lead: Profile saved and reflects changes

Title: Change password flow
Regression:
1. Go to change password
2. Enter old & new password
3. Save
Reviewed by QA Lead: Password updated; re-login with new password works

Title: View order history
Regression:
1. Go to My Orders
2. View past orders list
Reviewed by QA Lead: List displays past orders with statuses

Title: Cancel order within allowed window
Regression:
1. Open recent order
2. If allowed, click Cancel
3. Confirm
Reviewed by QA Lead: Order cancelled and status updated

Title: Admin add new book (desktop)
Regression:
1. Admin login
2. Go to Add Book
3. Enter details
4. Save
Reviewed by QA Lead: Book added and visible in catalog

Title: Admin edit book details
Regression:
1. Admin selects book
2. Edit fields
3. Save
Reviewed by QA Lead: Changes reflected in catalog

Title: Admin delete book
Regression:
1. Admin selects book
2. Delete and confirm
Reviewed by QA Lead: Book removed from catalog

Title: Admin manage user roles
Regression:
1. Admin opens user list
2. Change role to admin/user
3. Save
Reviewed by QA Lead: User role updated and permissions reflect change

Title: HTTPS enforced on all pages
Regression:
1. Open site pages
2. Verify URL begins with https://
Reviewed by QA Lead: All sensitive pages use HTTPS

Title: Password stored hashed in DB
Regression: 1. Inspect DB storage for user passwords (admin access)
Reviewed by QA Lead: Passwords are hashed; not stored in plain text

Title: Load test - 1000 concurrent users
Regression:
1. Run load test simulation with 1000 virtual users
2. Monitor response times/errors
Reviewed by QA Lead: System handles load within SLA (acceptable error rate)

Title: Responsive layout check (mobile portrait)
Regression:
1. Open site on mobile portrait
2. Verify layout and navigation
Reviewed by QA Lead: UI adapts correctly and is usable

Title: Responsive layout check (mobile landscape)
Regression:
1. Open site on mobile landscape
2. Verify layout
Reviewed by QA Lead: UI adapts correctly

Title: Error handling displays user-friendly messages
Regression:
1. Force 500 server error
2. Observe displayed message
Reviewed by QA Lead: User sees friendly error page with retry option
